description:
I met Diego while driving by a park. I was sipping on a soda when, out of the corner of my eye, I saw this really hot guy jogging along one of the paths wearing nothing but a skimpy pair of shorts and running shoes.
I quickly pulled over and got out. Luckily, he was just finishing up so it wasn't hard to catch up with him. I asked him if he had ever done any modeling before and he told me that he had been in a sexy commercial back in Argentina, his native country.
It turns out that he's well educated and knows three languages. Fortunately, he's not ashamed of his beautiful body and liked the idea of showing it off for a little extra money.
We talked for a good thirty minutes there in the park. He was all sweaty and I noticed that he wasn't wearing a jockstrap or underwear. I was thankful that I wore sunglasses that day (they hid my eyes), because I caught myself constantly staring at the outline of his cock in his shorts. I could tell then that he had a nice endowment and getting him naked for the camera definitely confirmed it!
title: Diego
